biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.repository
Interface AssociationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
GenericRepository<Association,java.lang.Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssociationRepositoryImpl
public interface AssociationRepository
extends GenericRepository<Association,java.lang.Long>

AssociationRepository represents the repository interface for Associations

Author:
Matthias Neubauer
